text: Since 2001, the Black Entertainment Television network has been celebrating African American stars in all entertainment fields, including music, acting, and sports. And every year the attendees bring their A-game to the annual event's red carpet. Click through to see the best fashion moments through the years, leading up to the 2018 BET Awards on Sunday, June 24.
title: The Best BET Awards Looks of All Times
